posts.author: Monsieur_Novembre
posts.title: Stacey Plaskett, delegate to the United States House of Representatives from the United States Virgin Islands' at-large congressional district

posts.raw_content:
Today, the dirty asshole known as Rep Stacey Plaskett desparately attempted to defend HER ACTIONS BECAUSE SHE TOOK MONEY FROM JEFFREY EPSTEIN! As she was hopelessly defending herself, she said that all the money she took "she gave it to a women's organization". 

This cunt is a liar. 

A single Black mom from the US Virgin Islands who’s out here playing the victim card like she got arrested at WalMart for EBT Fraud! All while swimming in dirty money from Jeffrey Epstein! 

Plaskett greedily pocketed Epstein’s dirty cash—$5,400 in 2016 and another $2,700 in 2018—like it was a typical raid at the local Target that we've seen people of this culture perform so often. 

She was fully aware of Epstein's 2008 conviction for exploiting minors. That’s not a rumor or a whisper in the wind; it’s cold, hard public record! Yet, she didn’t just take the money and run—she doubled down, slinking into his creepy Manhattan mansion in 2018 to beg for a $30,000 pledge for the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee. 

Fast forward to 2019, when Epstein’s sex-trafficking horrors exploded in the headlines once more, and Plaskett suddenly found her conscience—or so she’d have us believe. With a dramatic flourish, she bleated, “I’m uncomfortable now!” as if she hadn’t been wallowing in his grime for years. She vowed to donate the equivalent of his contributions to women’s charities in the Virgin Islands—worthy outfits like The Women’s Coalition—painting herself as some newfound saint. Oh, please! Her team initially flat-out admitted they planned to keep the cash, only backpedaling when the public’s outrage turned up the heat. And here’s where it gets even richer: there’s not a scrap of evidence she ever forked over a single cent! Not one measly receipt to back up her lofty promises!

Texts from 2019 reveal Epstein coaching her during a congressional hearing on Michael Cohen, as if she were his personal ventriloquist dummy, strings pulled by a monster’s hand. Wrap your head around that for a second: she knew his rap sheet, took his money, fished for more, and still let him whisper in her ear during official business. 

She lied today during her Censure meeting!

Next she'll say Epstein’s money was just “reparations” money! 

https://www.cnn.com/2025/11/14/politics/epstein-texts-stacey-plaskett
https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2018/12/billionaire-sex-offender-epstein-gave-heavily/
https://stthomassource.com/content/2019/07/10/plaskett-giving-epstein-donations-to-charity/
https://www.businessinsider.com/jeffrey-epstein-island-politics-stacey-plaskett-2023-6
https://www.cnbc.com/2019/07/09/democratic-congresswoman-will-return-jeffrey-epstein-donation.html

posts.title: Democrat Judge Tosses DOJ Lawsuit, Blocks ICE Arrests at New York Courthouses
